solution_line_template: The vans held {num_vans} vans * {people_per_van} people = <<{num_vans}*{people_per_van}={people_in_vans}>>{people_in_vans} people.
The buses held {num_buses} buses * {people_per_bus} people = <<{num_buses}*{people_per_bus}={people_in_buses}>>{people_in_buses} people.
The total number of people on the field trip is {people_in_vans} + {people_in_buses} = <<{people_in_vans}+{people_in_buses}={total_people}>>{total_people} people.
